name: ansible
description: Ansible engineering plugin for developing, reviewing, and securing Ansible automation with specialized agents for roles, playbooks, Jinja2 templates, and orchestration
author: Eric Austin <e@plsr.io>

agents.name: ansible-orchestrator
agents.description: Main orchestrator for coordinating Ansible development tasks across specialized agents

agents.name: ansible-developer
agents.description: Develops Ansible roles, playbooks, tasks, handlers, and modules

agents.name: ansible-code-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews Ansible code for errors, organization, best practices, and potential issues

agents.name: ansible-security-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews Ansible code for security vulnerabilities and compliance issues

agents.name: jinja2-developer
agents.description: Develops Jinja2 templates with domain-specific expertise through specialist agent coordination

commands.name: review-ansible-code
commands.description: Review Ansible code for errors and best practices

commands.name: create-jinja2-template
commands.description: Create Jinja2 templates with domain expertise
